title: Strictly Come Dancing: week one – live
summary: Couples are set to debut their dance skills on the floor, showcasing their talents. The event promises excitement as some may shine while others struggle. Stay tuned for updates on every move they make!

title: Ryder Cup: USA 3½-8½ Europe – visitors extend lead after foursomes
summary: Live updates from day two at Bethpage Back as Europe aims to consolidate their lead. Follow our coverage for hole-by-hole commentary and insights. Stay tuned for the latest developments in the competition.

title: Tottenham v Wolves: Premier League – live
summary: Bottom-of-the-table Wolves are aiming to regain their form as they face a strong Tottenham side. Rob Smyth provides a detailed minute-by-minute report on the matchup. Fans can follow the game live for updates on this intriguing clash.

title: FBI arrest man who allegedly threatened to shoot people at Texas Pride parade
summary: Joshua Cole is accused of using a Facebook account to threaten retaliation for the murder of Charlie Kirk. The threats have raised concerns about potential violence. Authorities are investigating the situation to ensure public safety.

title: Family of British couple held in Iran say their health is deteriorating in prison
summary: Lindsay Foreman's son has voiced significant worries after his mother was placed on a drip for medical treatment. He also highlighted the ongoing health issues faced by his stepfather, Craig. The situation has raised alarm for the family amid their struggles.
